responses.default:
**Bruce Blake is a full-stack software engineer with proven experience at Google and successful entrepreneurial ventures.**

## Key Highlights
• **2x Google Intern** - Worked on Android and Chrome OS teams
• **2.5M+ users impacted** through Google internship projects
• **$15K+ revenue generated** from entrepreneurial AI ventures
• **3.85 GPA** at Virginia Tech (Computer Engineering)

## Technical Expertise
• **Languages**: C++, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Java, Go
• **Frontend**: React, Next.js, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS
• **Backend**: Node.js, Express, Django, FastAPI
• **Cloud/DevOps**: AWS, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes
• **AI/ML**: TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, OpenAI APIs

Bruce combines deep technical knowledge with business acumen, having built revenue-generating AI systems while maintaining academic excellence. His experience spans from low-level C++ game engines to cloud-native architectures.
responses.experience:
**Bruce has impressive industry experience with 2 Google internships and consistent entrepreneurial success.**

## Google Experience
### Software Engineering Intern - Android Team (Summer 2023)
• **Modernized 25+ system applications** to Material You design
• **Impacted 2.5M+ Android users** through UI improvements
• **Reduced crashes by 30%** through better error handling

### STEP Intern - Chrome OS Team (Summer 2022)
• **Improved boot time by 15%** for Chrome OS devices
• **Enhanced security features** for 30M+ Chrome OS users
• Received **outstanding performance review**

## Entrepreneurial Ventures
### PromptForge AI (2023-Present)
• **Generated $15K+ revenue** from B2B AI solutions
• **Reduced content creation time by 80%** for clients
• Built with Python, FastAPI, and GPT-4

### InvisibleMode Chrome Extension (2022)
• **5,000+ active users** for privacy-focused browsing
• **4.8/5 star rating** on Chrome Web Store
responses.skills:
**Bruce possesses a comprehensive skill set spanning from systems programming to modern web development.**

## Technical Skills Matrix

### **Systems & Languages**
• **C++** - Built custom 3D game engine with physics
• **Python** - Primary language for AI/ML projects
• **JavaScript/TypeScript** - Full-stack web applications
• **Go** - Microservices and concurrent systems

### **Frameworks & Tools**
• **Frontend**: React (4+ years), Next.js, Vue.js
• **Backend**: Express.js, Django, FastAPI
• **Databases**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
• **Cloud**: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Google Cloud

### **Specialized Knowledge**
• **AI/ML**: LangChain, OpenAI APIs, TensorFlow
• **Graphics**: OpenGL, WebGL, Custom rendering pipelines
• **DevOps**: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines
• **Testing**: Jest, Pytest, Selenium

### **Soft Skills**
• Technical leadership and mentoring
• Client communication and project management
• Rapid prototyping and iterative development
responses.projects:
**Bruce's projects demonstrate both technical depth and business impact.**

## Featured Projects

### **TopShotBot** (2024)
• **AI-powered NBA trading assistant** using GPT-4
• **Processes 100K+ transactions** monthly
• **95% accuracy** in price predictions
• Built with Python, FastAPI, and React

### **3D Physics Engine** (2023)
• **Custom C++ engine** with collision detection
• **Supports 10,000+ simultaneous objects**
• Implemented spatial partitioning for optimization
• Used in 2 indie game projects

### **LocalLens** (2023)
• **AI tour guide mobile app** for travelers
• **4.7/5 rating** with 1,000+ downloads
• Integrates GPT-4 with geolocation APIs
• React Native + Node.js backend

### **QuantumLeap Education** (2022)
• **VR-based learning platform** for physics
• **Improved test scores by 25%** in pilot program
• Unity3D with custom C# modules
• Won Best Education Hack at VTHacks
responses.education:
**Bruce is pursuing a Computer Engineering degree at Virginia Tech with exceptional academic performance.**

## Education

### **Virginia Tech** (2021 - 2025)
**Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering**
• **3.85 GPA** (Dean's List: Fall 2022, Spring 2023)
• **Relevant Coursework**: Data Structures, Algorithms, Computer Architecture, Operating Systems, Machine Learning, Database Systems

### **Academic Achievements**
• **VT Engineering Scholar** - Top 10% of engineering students
• **Undergraduate Research** - AI applications in healthcare
• **Teaching Assistant** - CS 2114 (Data Structures)

### **Extracurricular Activities**
• **VT Competitive Programming Team** - Regional finalist
• **HackVT President** - Organized 500+ person hackathon
• **Google Developer Student Club** - Technical lead

### **Certifications**
